summary: Transmittal of Memorandum of Oral Commitment for Alberto PONZOA y Alvarez. Subject was a contact of the Havana Station and made sea rendezvous operations. He now wishes to disassociate himself completely from any Cuban political group and desires to place himself under KUBARK control. It is proposed to use Subject as a small boat captain in maritime operations.
title: Transmittal of Memorandum of Oral Commitment for Alberto PONZOA y Alvarez
